job.title: Looking for .Net & Azure expert
job.description:
We are seeking a skilled and experienced Azure Developer to join our dynamic team. As an Azure Developer, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining scalable and secure cloud-based solutions on the Microsoft Azure platform. The ideal candidate should have a strong background in cloud computing, expertise in Azure services, and a proven track record in delivering high-quality solutions.

Key Responsibilities:

Solution Development:

Design, develop, and implement scalable and secure cloud solutions on the Microsoft Azure platform.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather requirements and ensure the successful delivery of projects.
Azure Services:

Utilize a wide range of Azure services, including but not limited to Azure App Service, Azure Functions, Azure SQL Database, Azure Storage, and Azure Logic Apps.
Implement and optimize serverless computing architectures for efficient application deployment.
Code Development:

Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code following best practices.
Conduct code reviews to ensure code quality and adherence to coding standards.
Integration:

Integrate Azure solutions with on-premises systems and third-party services.
Implement API integrations and manage data flow between different systems.
Security and Compliance:

Implement and enforce security measures to protect Azure resources and data.
Ensure compliance with industry standards and regulations in all developed solutions.
Monitoring and Optimization:

Monitor Azure solutions for performance, reliability, and cost-effectiveness.
Optimize resource utilization and recommend improvements for efficiency.
Documentation:

Create comprehensive technical documentation for developed solutions.
Provide training and support to other team members.
Qualifications:

Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field.
Proven experience as a developer with a focus on Azure technologies.
In-depth knowledge of Azure services, architecture, and best practices.
Strong programming skills in languages such as C#, Python, or PowerShell.
Experience with DevOps practices and tools, including CI/CD pipelines.
Excellent problem-solving and troubleshooting skills.
Strong communication and collaboration skills.
Certifications (Preferred):

Microsoft Certified: Azure Developer Associate
Microsoft Certified: Azure Solutions Architect Expert
If you are a highly motivated individual with a passion for Azure development and a commitment to delivering high-quality solutions, we invite you to apply for this exciting opportunity. Join our team and contribute to the success of innovative and cutting-edge projects in the cloud computing space.

customFields.generatedDescriptionAI:
We are looking for a skilled .Net & Azure expert to join our team for a project that is expected to last more than 6 months. The ideal candidate should have a strong background in API development, SQL, .NET Framework, ASP.NET, Azure App Service, Microsoft Azure SQL Database, C#, and ASP.NET MVC.

As a candidate, we would like you to submit a detailed proposal that outlines how you can contribute to the project. Please describe your experience and expertise in the relevant technologies and highlight any past projects where you have successfully implemented similar solutions.

Additionally, we would appreciate it if you could provide links to past completed projects that showcase your skills and abilities. These examples will help us evaluate your capabilities and determine if you are the right fit for our team.
